For the Mercado Bag, customization is limited to 3 letters or characters only

promo_and_exclusions: Discount codes don't work on market.apolisglobal.com. They only work on apolisglobal.com

Apolis: The future of jute - Handcrafted from rain-fed fibers and sun-dried for natural strength. Each bag takes over three hours to weave and is finished with a personalized gold-foil leather patch.

The Grass Collection is here now.

apolis.attn.tv/arr09SOYq-pB

Apolis: Hey Sam, this is Sarah. I see you left something in your cart. Such a great choice, btw!

 https://apolis.attn.tv/aqFsoyYKY24D 
 
Need any help? Any questions I can answer for you?

Apolis: Hi Sam!
Just a quick note to - sincerely - thank you for helping break a poverty cycle with your Market Bag

Watch the award-winning story: https://apolis.attn.tv/aOx--7jbDCyG
Hey Apolis! I have a question
Apolis: Thanks for texting us! How can I help you?

My most recent order was 2 of the new grass bucket bags. 1 petite and 1 reg. no customization. I had ordered prior to this order 2 bags as gifts with customization. They look beautiful. Both orders have arrived. The new grass bucket bags are in poor condition! The threads are snagged, in several areas on both grass bucket bags. And the leather tag was sewn on crooked. Im surprised they were shipped out to me in this condition. How do I return the 2 grass bucket bags? I would like the refund to the credit card I used to purchase them. FYI on one of the orders I was on the I think 4 payments? But I'm not sure if it was the grass bucket bag order? We can easily look that up...Kind regards,Sam Gates
Template used: "How do I start a return?"; last updated: 2023-08-25 17:34:58.739

Apolis: Hi Sam, thank you for reaching out and I'm truly sorry to hear about the condition of the grass bucket bags you received. I understand how disappointing that must have been, especially after having such a positive experience with your previous customized orders. To initiate a possible return, email us at service@apolisglobal.com with an image of your bag and a description of the issue and we'll get back to you ASAP with an answer.

Hi, I have tried over and over to order the same order again. It was canceled by Green Pan because they suspected it was fraud. I called and was told that I could get the same deal online and every time I try to get the same deal with the same items I end up paying more at checkout. Can you help me?686306

GreenPan: I'm really sorry for the frustration this has caused. I'll do my best to help you get this sorted. Could you send me a screenshot of all the items in your cart? That will help me check their eligibility and test the offer on my end. 

Also, could you let me know which specific deal or discount code you were trying to use? Please note that sale items, cookbooks, gift cards, the recycling kit, shipping protection, and the Frost Ice Cream & Frozen Drink Maker are excluded from discount codes. You can find more details here: https://greenpan.attn.tv/axsiW76U6LsT
Yes, thanks.
Screenshot sent
The card address and shipping address should be different. I'm sending it to my son as a wedding gift.

GreenPan: Thanks for the screenshot and I'm sorry about that! Please double-check that the billing ZIP code you entered matches the one linked to your credit card. I also recommend trying to open the site in an incognito or private window to rule out any browser cache or extension issues. 

Please also note that we offer different deals at different times so prices may vary.
The person I spoke to on the phone told me I would be able to pay the same price. I think it has to do with the fact that I've already given my email for the discount and it's not applying it again.
GreenPan: Got it. Since you already spoke with someone on the phone, please wait for an update from my team. Kindly check your spam and promo folders as well, as our emails sometimes end up there.
The person on the phone wasn't able to help me. He just told me to go back online and pay the same price.
Which hasn't happened because I can't use the same discount code again because you already have my email and my phone number which is where I am getting all these constant text messages from

GreenPan: Thanks for sharing that with me, and I'm sorry to hear that, it's not the experience we wanted you to have with us. I really wish I could, but unfortunately, I can't help with this directly as my system isn't set up for this type of issue. I recommend reaching out to our customer support team, as they're best equipped to help and will take great care of you!

Please send us an email customercare.us@greenpan.com. Our team will help you make healthy cooking easier.
